title: Problem with  the new client
body:
Hello,
When I tried to reinstall the game, I was confronted with the fact that I can no longer access the new client of the game.

When I press Play, I got this message :

League Client Error
League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again.

After that message, I can't access the new client.

Before reinstalling the game, the new client was working properly. And I tried to reinstall and repair the game many time; but no changes.

replies.body:
What happens when you try using the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

Are you able to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) at all?  It sounds like your installation didn't run properly, so you'll have to re-download league.  Let me know!

Hello, thank you for your reply.

Someone from your support told me to delete LeagueClient, and it's worked. The client was correctly updated.
